document_data.name: Purple Portals
document_data.mainbody: The '''Purple Portals''' was a temple and workshop devoted to [[Gond]] in [[Melvaunt]], one of the oldest temples in all of Melvaunt.
document_data.Location: The temple was found near the center of the city.
document_data.Activities:
The primary function of the temple was to research and develop improved methods of processing and packaging. Though they also worked to research new methods of construction, insulation, and waterproofing.

An impressive laboratory was used to modify specialized machines.
document_data.Reputation: The temple was held in quite high regard as their research efforts would ultimately benefit the populace as a whole. It also attracted many Gondar pilgrims, particularly [[gnome]]s.
document_data.Trivia: The [[priest]]s of this temple had access to the Gondar [[artificer]] [[Ikathilo]]'s laboratory in [[Mechanus]].
